Package main

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
main.Ship
public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
Class that models a Ship.

    Creates the Ship object with the given variables.

    • Ship

      public Ship​(java.lang.String name, int capacity, int crewSize, int durability)
      Creates the Ship object with the given variables.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Ship.
      capacity - The capacity of the Ship.
      crewSize - The size of the crew on the Ship.
      durability - The durability of the Ship.

    • addItemCargo

      public boolean addItemCargo​(Item item, int amount)
      Add an amount of an item to the ship's cargo.
      Parameters:
      item - an Item to store
      amount - the amount of the item to store
      Returns:
      true if there is sufficient space to store amount, false otherwise.
